products.description:
General Information

Henry Blooms Kids Probiotic Toothpaste is full of natural goodies with none of the nasties to keep little mouths fresh and clean. Unique oral probiotic ingredients Dental-Lac™ works together with Xylitol to clean the teeth and gums, promote healthy oral flora and fight non-beneficial bacteria.

Warnings

This product is safe if swallowed but not recommended.

Common Uses

Henry Blooms Kids Probiotic Toothpaste is full of natural goodies with none of the nasties to keep little mouths fresh and clean.

Directions

Brush gently in a circular motion twice a day. Rinse and spit out after brushing.

products.description:
General Information

Biore Yuzu Lemon + Papaya Brightening Clay Mask - Lifts dead skin cells and boosts radiance to improve tone and texture, for brighter skin in 1 week* Yuzu Lemon is a known source of Vitamin C, known for its ability to balance and brighten Papaya contains natural enzymes known to smooth skin by removing dead skin buildup

Warnings

Warning: For external use only. Keep out of reach of children. Not a food. Do not ingest.

Common Uses

Specially formulated with our proven Japanese technology and AHA fruit acid, this unique mask lifts dead skin cells and surface debris while brightening the look of skin for a smoother and more radient complexion

Ingredients

Ingredients : Aqua, Kaolin, Glycerin, Cetyl Alcohol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Glyceryl Stearate, PEG-100 Stearate, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Xanthan Gum, Parfum, Mica, Sodium Hydroxide, Disodium EDTA, Ascorbic Acid, Citric Acid, Tromethamine, Lactobacillus/Papaya Fruit Ferment Extract, Malic Acid, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Citrus Junos Extract, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Benzoate, CI 15510, CI 77891

Directions

WET FACE. To apply mask, squeeze a generous amount of product onto fingertips and spread evenly across face, avoiding the eye area. Allow mask to sit on skin for 3-5 minutes. Feeling a little tingle? Don't worry, that's the mask hard at work! REMOVE AND REFRESH: Wet face and rinse thoroughly. If needed use a washcloth. Use 2-3 times per week.

products.description:
General Information

A seriously delicious high-protein bar that's actually good for you? It does exist! The perfect convenient and nutritious treat that's low in carbs and contains no artificial flavours or sweetners. Pop one in your bag to fight afternoons cravings, satisfy the sweet tooth or get your protein hit on-the-go. Choose from a range of incredible flavours: Cookie Dough, Choc Mint, Rocky Road, Cookies & Cream & Salted Caramel.

Warnings

Made on Equipment which processes Peanuts, Tree Nuts & Sesame, therefore these allergens may be present. Excess consumption may have a laxative effect

Common Uses

Snacking, for those on the go. An ideal post-workout protein hit, craving crusher or healthy treat.

Ingredients

BSc Protein Blend (Dairy Protein Blend [Whey Protein Concentrate, Whey Protein Isolate, Calcium Caseinate], Soy Protein Isolate), No Added Sugar Protein Chocolate (Maltitol, Cocoa Solids [33%], Milk Solids [20%], Soy Protein Isolate, Emulsifiers [Soy Lecithin, Polyglycerol Polyricinoleate], Natural Vanilla Flavour), Polydextrose, Maltitol, Humectant (Glycerol), Sorbitol, Vanilla Paste, Glycine, Sugar Free Mint Chips (2.5%), Sunflower Oil, Soy Protein Nuggets, Cocoa Powder (1.5%), Stevia Extract, Natural Flavour, Emulsifier (Soy Lecithin), Salt, Antioxidant (Mixed Tocopherols).

Directions

Use as an in between meal snack or post workout.

products.description:
General Information

Need a healthy, delicious snack you can feel good about? Nothing but all-natural, nutritionally dense ingredients like plant proteins, fruits, seeds and nuts, all in a perfect 50g bar. Simply bursting with quality protein, antioxidants, fibre, healthy fats and no nasty additives. 100% vegan friendly, non-GMO, with no dairy, no gluten, no added sugar and definitely no artificial sweeteners, flavours or colours. Take your pick from three incredible flavours: Banana Bread, Choc Lamington and Lemon Cashew.

Warnings

Made on Equipment which processes Milk, Peanuts, Treenuts and Sesame. May contain traces of these allergens. Due to seasonal variances of the natural ingredients used, texture and taste may very slightly throughout the year. CHEW WITH CARE – as we use real dates, some date pits or date fragments may remain

Common Uses

Snacking, for those on the go. Great for a pre-workout energy boost, post-workout recovery or healthy snack/treat any time of day.

Ingredients

Dates, Pears, Cashews, Soy Protein Isolate, Rice Protein Isolate, Pepitas, Coconut, Chia seeds, Pea Protein Isolate, Natural Lemon Oil, Antioxidant (Vitamin E)

Directions

Use as an in between meal snack
